Name: Cape Cod
Recipe: Fill Ice, 1.5oz Vodka, Fill with Cranberry Juice

Name: Screwdriver
Recipe: Fill Ice, 1.5oz Vodka, Fill with Orange Juice

Name: Vodka Soda
Recipe: Fill Ice, 1.5oz Vodka, Fill Soda Water

Name: Tequila Soda
Recipe: Fill Ice, 1.5oz Tequila, Fill Soda Water

Name: Bay Breeze
Recipe: Fill Ice, 1.5oz Vodka, Fill equal parts Cranberry and Pineapple juice

Name: Madras
Recipe: Fill Ice, 1.5oz Vodka, Fill equal parts Cranberry and Orange juice

Name: Mai Tai
Recipe: Fill Ice, 1oz White Rum, fill 3/4 with Pineapple Juice, layer Grenadine, float 1oz Dark Rum
